<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 276, 178, 292]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[832, 277, 905, 292]]<|/det|>
0625/31  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 300, 265, 316]]<|/det|>
Paper 3 Theory (Core)  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[707, 300, 905, 316]]<|/det|>
October/November 2020  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[760, 325, 905, 341]]<|/det|>
1 hour 15 minutes  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 355, 395, 370]]<|/det|>
You must answer on the question paper.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 383, 359, 399]]<|/det|>
No additional materials are needed.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 222, 434]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 808, 574]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- You may use a calculator.- You should show all your working and use appropriate units.- Take the weight of \(1.0 \text{kg}\) to be \(10 \text{N}\) (acceleration of free fall \(= 10 \text{m/s}^2\)).  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 603, 213, 618]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 619, 730, 651]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 80.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[282, 867, 712, 883]]<|/det|>

<label>1</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 490, 89]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 801, 89]]<|/det|>
Electrical energy is provided to homes and industry from a coal-fired power station.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 103, 144, 121]]<|/det|>
<label>(a)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 102, 801, 120]]<|/det|>
The main stages in the operation of a coal-fired power station are listed below.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 134, 432, 151]]<|/det|>
They are **not** in the correct order.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 165, 173, 183]]<|/det|>
<label>A</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[191, 165, 425, 183]]<|/det|>
The boiler produces steam.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 180, 173, 198]]<|/det|>
<label>B</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 180, 443, 198]]<|/det|>
The turbine turns a generator.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 196, 173, 214]]<|/det|>
<label>C</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 196, 564, 214]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 212, 173, 230]]<|/det|>
<label>D</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 212, 625, 230]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 228, 173, 246]]<|/det|>
<label>E</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 228, 539, 246]]<|/det|>
The generator produces electrical energy.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 243, 173, 261]]<|/det|>
<label>F</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 243, 388, 261]]<|/det|>
Steam turns a turbine.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[153, 259, 173, 277]]<|/det|>
<label>G</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[195, 259, 395, 277]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 72, 423, 89]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 266, 796, 285]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[888, 297, 920, 315]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[149, 329, 180, 346]]<|/det|>
<label>(ii)</label>
